string.text: Hey, you said, someone left a little of loot for me, right?
Oh... Yea, here it is.
Perfect. I'm taking it now.

Hey, wait a second... No-no, I'm not trying to rob it from you, off course its yours. I kept it safe and you can get it now. By the way, I didnt know, maybe there was something harmful inside, and I'not a very healthy man these days, not like in the old days... So. One hundred for keeping it for you - I think it's a fair deal. OK?
Damn, your greed is like a curse! Here, take it "For safe keeping", huh...
That's fine. Take you loot.
Have you lost your mind? You'll give it here now, or I'll speak up about your undercover deals!
Damn, I'm empty now. Shall take it after some time.
Here, take your diamond gift.
Ha-ha, you scared me! Who will listen to your words?
Newbies in rookies camp. You can be sure, they will buy nothing from you after that.
The Military!. Guess, what they will do with an illegal trader caught in Zone?
My word is not enough! My fist will speak up! Do you want it?
I got some friends here. Very powerful people, you know...

They will buy nothing - others will buy more. This is Zone.\n They can not leave the Zone - soldiers blocked all exits, and for going deeper they will need ammo, weapons... Where can you get those except me? \n So I don't give a shit on what you say to them, got it?

Ha! Ha-ha! You are really funny guy! I cant laugh enough...\n Where do you think I get all this equipment, all of those arms and ammo? And who do you think is transfering artefacts from the Zone? The Military needs my business more than anyone. \n But you can go there, that's gonna be interesting. I wonder, will they shoot you before you say something, or after...
Man, if you are more greedy than me - just say it. I do not like guys who's fists are ahead of words...
Remember - friendship ends where big money begins. And I don't care about your friends. Now they are powerful, tomorrow they will be lost - it's Zone, understand?
Okay. One hundred - and take your gift.
Thank you.
Got it.
You have something for me, one guy left it, right?
Yes, a small package. It is here... I almost forgot. Do you need it now?
Yes, I'm taking it.
No problem, here it is.
Thank you very much.
